taro.title: Tarot Card Reading
taro.subtitle: Get AI-powered tarot interpretations and insights
taro.createSessionDescription: Begin a new tarot reading session. Each session includes up to 3 cards and AI-powered interpretations.
taro.sessionExpiresIn: Your session will expire in {minutes} minutes
taro.followUpPlaceholder: Ask a clarifying question about your reading...
taro.maxFollowUpsReached: You've reached the maximum number of follow-ups for this session.
taro.dailyLimitReached: You've reached your daily session limit. Upgrade your plan or try again tomorrow.
taro.benefit1Desc: Get detailed, personalized interpretations of your cards
taro.benefit2Desc: Ask clarifying questions to deepen your understanding
taro.benefit3Desc: Review all your past readings anytime

history.title: Reading History
history.noHistory: No readings yet. Start your first reading!

errors.permissionDenied: You don't have permission for this operation

oracle.explainMode: Do you seek a detailed explanation of each card, or shall we explore how they relate to your situation?
oracle.situationPrompt: Please describe your situation in a few words (up to 100 words).
oracle.reading: Oracle is reflecting on your cards and situation...
oracle.chatInputPlaceholder: Ask the Oracle a question about your reading...
oracle.chatHint: Continue the conversation with follow-up questions (Ctrl+Enter to send)
